articles.title: Antarctica's Doomsday Glacier is 'holding on by its fingernails' - Daily Mail
articles.description: The West Antarctica glacier - which is about the size of Florida - has been an important consideration for scientists trying to make predictions about global sea level rise.
articles.content:
Antarctica's Thwaites Glacier is 'holding on by its fingernails', experts say, after discovering that it has retreated twice as fast as previously thought over the past 200 years.
